scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.docker:dev: COMPOSE_BAKE=0 docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker:dev:detach: COMPOSE_BAKE=0 docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild: COMPOSE_BAKE=0 docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d frontend backend
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild:frontend: COMPOSE_BAKE=0 docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d frontend
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild:backend: COMPOSE_BAKE=0 docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d backend
scripts.docker:logs:frontend: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f frontend
scripts.docker:logs:backend: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f backend
scripts.docker:logs:db: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f mongodb
scripts.docker:restart:frontend: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml restart frontend
scripts.docker:restart:backend: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml restart backend
scripts.docker:restart:db: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml restart mongodb
scripts.docker:shell:backend: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh
scripts.docker:shell:db: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec mongodb mongosh -u admin -p
scripts.docker:db:status: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T mongodb mongosh --quiet --eval 'db.adminCommand("ping")'
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down -v --rmi local
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker compose --env-file infra/docker/.env -f infra/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down -v --rmi all --remove-orphans
scripts.k8s:dev:build: docker build -f infra/docker/Dockerfile.web -t prenatal-learning:dev . && docker build -f infra/docker/Dockerfile.server -t prenatal-learning-backend:dev ./apps/server
